# glyph-breadcrumbs

## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                                                                              | Type                         | Default |
| -------- | --------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------- | ------- |
| `crumbs` | --        | Crumb property. Last one is displayed as active. Each crumb triggers a callback on click | `Crumb[]`                    | `[]`    |
| `i18n`   | --        | Extra i18n translation object                                                            | `{ [key: string]: string; }` | `{}`    |
